abstract: Readers offer their comments on my "Occupy Wall Street" column.
snippet: Readers offer their comments on my "Occupy Wall Street" column.
lead_paragraph: My Sunday column is about the Occupy Wall Street movement -- and in particular suggestions for financial reforms that the movement should take up. My Twitter comparison of the occupied park with Tahrir Square already raised eyebrows -- and caused me to rush to clarify -- so I'd welcome comments on that, or on any specific steps you recommend to reform the financial system.

headline.main: Suggestions for that, er, Tahrir on the Hudson?
